Game.Name: Twin Cobra - Desert Attack Helicopter (USA)
Game.plot: Twin Cobra is an Action game, developed by Graphic Research and published by Treco,which was released in Japan in 1991.Cheat: CodesDuring gameplay, press start and enter the following:Cheat: CodesPress start on the title screen then press Up, Down, Right, Left, A, B, C, Start.Cheat: CodesPress Up, Down, Right, Left, Start after the helicopter lands at the title screen. ''Stage Select'' words will then appear.
Game.Notes: You pilot the TC-17 Twin Cobra assault helicopter to fight the forces of Commander Anziga, the myopic leader of the nation of Kaban. Your job is to fly into Kaban and take out the entire military base of Commander Anziga. You will fight small helicopters, tanks and stationary guns, defeat the large helicopters to get power-ups. By picking up colored icons (blue, yellow, red or green) you can change to different weapon types. Blue is a forward spread shot, yellow is a four-way shot, red is a wide forward laser shot and green is a continuous forward laser shot. At the end of each section, you land on a carrier ship and count up your bonuses.
